title: Koi Fish Portrait
subtitle: Digital Piece
alt: woman with red v neck shirt, and short straight blue black hair gazing at you with red and white koi fish swimming around her. There is a water shimmer going diagonally down the piece
description:
2021 

This is one of my favorite pieces I have ever created. I love the depth of the water and the texture on top as well as the colors. I'm a really big fan of red and blue together and it works really well in this piece. This was after a few previous attempts at making my portraits more cohesive by adding a background.
